description.value:
The Patron you choose lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

The Genie
Spell LevelGenie SpellsDjnni Spells
cantrip@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplResistance]{Resistance}@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGust000000]{Gust}
1st@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDetectEvil]{Detect Evil and Good}@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplThunderwav]{Thunderwave}
2nd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.F2efriniToiMPjfv]{Phantasmal Force}@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.bwCrVfOuK0L9zAEk]{Gust of Wind}
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCreateFood]{Create Food and Water}@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplWindWall00]{Wind Wall}
4th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplPhantasKil]{Phantasmal Killer}@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGreaterInv]{Greater Invisibility}
